items.name: Health Potion
items.description: A small vial of ruby-red liquid that glows faintly with restorative magic. The glass is warm to the touch, and the liquid swirls on its own as if alive.

items.name: Greater Health Potion
items.description: A large crystal flask containing a deep crimson elixir. Golden flecks drift through the liquid like stars, and it pulses with powerful healing energy.

items.name: Supreme Health Potion
items.description: An ornate bottle of legendary healing draught, brewed by ancient alchemists. A single drop could mend shattered bones.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A bitter herbal remedy in a green glass vial. The acrid smell alone makes your eyes water, but it will purge any poison from your veins.

items.name: Spell Scroll
items.description: Ancient parchment inscribed with glowing arcane symbols that shift and writhe. Speaking the words aloud will unleash devastating magical energy.

items.name: Fireball Scroll
items.description: A scroll bound in salamander skin, radiating heat. The words are written in flame that never extinguishes.

items.name: Lightning Scroll
items.description: Static electricity crackles from this metallic scroll. Storm clouds seem to gather in the ink.

items.name: Ice Shard Scroll
items.description: Frost crystals form on this scroll's surface. Reading it conjures razor-sharp ice that pierces through enemies.

items.name: Meteor Scroll
items.description: This scroll smells of brimstone and cosmic dust. It calls down a fragment of a fallen star upon your foes.

items.name: Void Scroll
items.description: A scroll made of shadow-stuff that hurts to look at. It tears a hole in reality itself.

items.name: Poison Flask
items.description: A bubbling green liquid that eats through its container. Throwing it will dissolve flesh and armor alike.

items.name: Holy Water
items.description: Blessed water in a silver vial. Burns undead and demons like acid, heals the righteous.

items.name: Minor Mana Potion
items.description: A swirling blue potion that tastes like starlight. Restores magical energy.

items.name: Elixir of Strength
items.description: A thick red potion that smells of iron and rage. Your muscles bulge after drinking it. Restores HP and invigorates.

items.name: Regeneration Potion
items.description: A golden potion with flecks of phoenix feather. Wounds close before your eyes after drinking.

items.name: Potion of Fortitude
items.description: A dense silver liquid that weighs more than it should. Makes you feel invincible.

items.name: Dragon's Breath Potion
items.description: WARNING: Extremely flammable. This potion lets you breathe fire for a short time. Use on enemies!

items.name: Life Steal Potion
items.description: A dark potion that whispers hungrily. Drains life force from enemies and gives it to you.

items.name: Bare Fists
items.description: Your own two hands. Not much, but they've gotten you this far.

items.name: Wooden Club
items.description: A crude club carved from a thick oak branch. Splinters jut out at odd angles, and the grip is wrapped in dirty cloth. Primitive, but effective for cracking skulls.

items.name: Rusty Dagger
items.description: A small blade pitted with rust and neglect. The edge is dull and the handle is cracked, but it's better than nothing in a dark corridor.

items.name: Rusted Sword
items.description: An old longsword covered in orange-brown rust. The blade is notched and pitted, the leather grip rotted away. It might break at any moment, but it still has an edge.

items.name: Bone Knife
items.description: A wicked blade carved from the femur of some massive creature. Runes are scratched into the yellowed surface, and it hums with faint necromantic energy.

items.name: Short Sword
items.description: A reliable short sword with a keen edge and leather-wrapped hilt. Well-balanced and easy to wield, this is the weapon of choice for dungeon delvers.

items.name: Hunting Knife
items.description: A curved blade designed for skinning game, but equally effective at skinning goblins. The antler handle provides excellent grip.

items.name: Spiked Mace
items.description: A brutal weapon - an iron ball studded with cruel spikes on a wooden handle. Each spike is stained dark with old blood.

items.name: Battle Axe
items.description: A double-headed axe forged for war. The crescent blades gleam with deadly intent, and the ash wood handle is wrapped in worn leather.

items.name: Iron Sword
items.description: A well-crafted longsword of solid iron. The blade is straight and true, the edge razor-sharp. A dependable weapon for any warrior.

items.name: Flanged Mace
items.description: A heavy mace with protruding metal flanges designed to crush armor and bone alike. The weight feels reassuring in your hand.

items.name: Silver Rapier
items.description: An elegant thrusting sword with a silver-plated blade and ornate basket hilt. Light as a feather but deadly as a viper's strike.

items.name: War Hammer
items.description: A massive hammer with a head of solid steel. One side is flat for crushing, the other a spike for piercing. Skeletons fear this weapon.

items.name: Serrated Blade
items.description: A cruel sword with a saw-toothed edge that tears flesh rather than cuts it. Wounds from this weapon never heal cleanly.

items.name: Venom Blade
items.description: A wicked dagger with a hollow blade that drips with spider venom. Even a scratch brings agonizing pain and creeping paralysis.

items.name: Executioner's Sword
items.description: A massive two-handed blade with a squared tip - designed not for combat but for beheading. Dark stains mark the blade despite obvious attempts to clean it.

items.name: Crystal Dagger
items.description: A blade carved from a single perfect crystal that glows with inner light. It never dulls and cuts through armor like water.

items.name: Blessed Mace
items.description: A mace of pure silver etched with holy symbols. It glows with divine light and strikes true against all unholy creatures.

items.name: Vampiric Blade
items.description: A black sword that seems to drink in light. Red runes pulse along its length, and you feel it hunger for blood.

items.name: Dwarven War Axe
items.description: Forged in mountain fires by master smiths, this axe bears intricate knotwork and never needs sharpening. The runes spell out ancient battle oaths.

items.name: Flamberge
items.description: A two-handed sword with a wavy, flame-like blade. The undulating edge creates horrific wounds and makes parrying nearly impossible.

items.name: Necromancer's Staff
items.description: A twisted staff of blackened bone topped with a skull that weeps shadow. Dark whispers emanate from within, promising power over death itself.

items.name: Shadow Blade
items.description: A sword forged from crystallized darkness. Its edge exists partially in another dimension, allowing it to slip past defenses.

items.name: Void-Touched Blade
items.description: A blade that seems to be made of solidified nothingness. Looking at it too long causes vertigo, and those struck by it feel pieces of their soul torn away.

items.name: Queen Valdris's Blade
items.description: The legendary sword of Queen Valdris, who sealed the darkness centuries ago. It blazes with holy fire when drawn and strikes with the wrath of the righteous.

items.name: Dragon Slayer
items.description: A legendary greatsword six feet in length, too large for normal men. Dragon scales are embedded in the crossguard as trophies.

items.name: Starforged Blade
items.description: A blade forged from a fallen star, eternally cold to the touch. Constellations dance along its surface, and it cuts through magic as easily as flesh.

items.name: Warlord's Blade
items.description: A massive black sword that radiates palpable malevolence. Forged in hellfire and quenched in the blood of kings, it whispers promises of conquest to its wielder.

items.name: Soulreaver
items.description: An ancient blade that devours the souls of those it slays. Ghostly faces swirl in the metal, screaming silently for release.

items.name: Godsbane
items.description: A mythical weapon said to have wounded a deity. Reality itself bends around the blade, and holding it fills you with terrible power.

items.name: Cloth Armor
items.description: Padded cloth layered for basic protection. It won't stop a sword, but it might save you from a glancing blow.

items.name: Leather Armor
items.description: Sturdy boiled leather armor that covers your torso and shoulders. Scarred and worn but still serviceable.

items.name: Studded Leather Armor
items.description: Leather armor reinforced with metal studs that catch and deflect blades. The studs form a pattern of a snarling wolf.

items.name: Chainmail
items.description: A shirt of interlocking iron rings that jingles softly as you move. Heavy but effective against slashing attacks.

items.name: Brigandine Armor
items.description: A coat of small metal plates riveted inside layers of leather. Offers excellent protection while remaining flexible.

items.name: Iron Shield
items.description: A heavy round shield of hammered iron. Dents and scratches tell of battles survived. The leather arm straps are worn but hold firm.

items.name: Bone Shield
items.description: A shield made from bones fused together with dark magic. Skulls stare out from its surface. Macabre but surprisingly effective.

items.name: Scale Mail
items.description: Overlapping metal scales sewn onto leather, providing excellent protection while maintaining mobility.

items.name: Half Plate Armor
items.description: Plate armor covering vital areas combined with chainmail for flexibility. The balance of protection and mobility favored by veteran warriors.

items.name: Plate Armor
items.description: Full plate armor of polished steel. You feel invincible wearing it, though movement is somewhat restricted.

items.name: Tower Shield
items.description: A massive rectangular shield that can cover your entire body. Too heavy for offense but nearly impenetrable.

items.name: Reinforced Boots
items.description: Heavy boots with steel plating and thick soles. Your kicks now carry the weight of iron.

items.name: Steel Gauntlets
items.description: Articulated gauntlets of fine steel that protect your hands while allowing full dexterity. The knuckles are reinforced for punching.

items.name: Torturer's Helm
items.description: A sinister iron helm with a featureless face plate. Two narrow slits glow red in the darkness. Those who wore it were feared even by the guards.

items.name: Shadow Cloak
items.description: A cloak woven from shadow itself. It seems to deflect attacks into nothingness.

items.name: Arcane Robes
items.description: Robes woven with protective enchantments that shimmer with barely contained magic. Symbols of power are stitched into every seam.

items.name: Dark Cultist Robes
items.description: Black robes inscribed with forbidden symbols. Shadows cling to the fabric, and wearing them fills you with unease - but also protection.

items.name: Spider Silk Armor
items.description: Armor woven from the silk of giant spiders. Incredibly light yet strong as steel, it seems to flow like water when you move.

items.name: Holy Shield
items.description: A shield blessed by the gods themselves. It gleams with divine light that repels darkness and shields the faithful.

items.name: Valdris's Shield
items.description: The shield carried by Queen Valdris in her final battle. It has never been breached, and divine fire dances across its surface.

items.name: Celestial Armor
items.description: Armor that seems to be made of captured starlight. It weighs almost nothing yet stops blows that would fell a giant.

items.name: Amulet of the Void
items.description: A pendant containing a fragment of the void between stars. Attacks seem to bend around the wearer, deflected into nothingness.

items.name: Dragon Scale Armor
items.description: Armor crafted from the scales of a red dragon. It radiates heat and turns aside all but the mightiest blows.

items.name: Crypt Key
items.description: An ornate key made of blackened iron with a skull-shaped bow. It radiates unnatural cold that seeps into your bones.

items.name: Jail Key
items.description: A heavy iron key with rust along its teeth. It opens the cells in the prison block.

items.name: Library Key
items.description: An ornate brass key with a book-shaped handle. It opens the forbidden archives of the library.

items.name: Torch
items.description: A wooden torch wrapped in oil-soaked cloth, burning with a steady orange flame. It pushes back the darkness and reveals hidden secrets.

items.name: Warlord's Amulet
items.description: A blood-red amulet that pulses with malevolent energy. Holding it fills you with visions of conquest and domination. This is proof of the Warlord's defeat.

items.name: Rat Tail
items.description: A severed rat tail, still twitching. Disgusting, but some alchemists pay good coin for such things.

items.name: Stone Fragment
items.description: A fragment of animated stone that still radiates faint warmth. Runes glow dimly on its surface.

items.name: Gold Coins
items.description: A handful of ancient gold coins stamped with the face of a long-dead king.

items.name: Goblin Ear
items.description: A pointed green ear, proof of a goblin kill. Guards sometimes pay bounties for these.

items.name: Spider Fang
items.description: A massive fang dripping with paralytic venom. Alchemists prize these for their potent poisons.

items.name: Dark Essence
items.description: A swirling orb of pure darkness captured in a crystal sphere. Mages covet this for their rituals.

items.name: Frost Blade
items.description: A sword forged from eternal ice, cold enough to freeze blood on contact. Mist rises from the blade constantly, and frost spreads wherever it strikes.

items.name: Winter Cloak
items.description: A cloak woven from captured snowflakes and northern winds. It keeps you warm in the coldest depths and chills those who strike you.

items.name: Miner's Pickaxe
items.description: A well-worn pickaxe that has seen centuries of use. The head is made of a strange purple-veined metal that hums with power.

items.name: Void Shard
items.description: A fragment of crystallized nothingness that hurts to look at. It radiates anti-light and whispers of oblivion.

items.name: Spider Queen's Fang
items.description: A massive fang from the Spider Queen herself, still dripping with royal venom. A single scratch means certain death.

items.name: Web Weaver Armor
items.description: Armor crafted from the Spider Queen's own silk, impossibly light yet strong as steel. It shimmers with an oily iridescence.

items.name: Bone Crusher
items.description: A massive maul made from fused bones and dark iron. It was designed to shatter other undead, and it excels at its purpose.

items.name: Skull Helm
items.description: A helm crafted from a giant's skull, reinforced with iron bands. The empty eye sockets glow faintly when danger approaches.

items.name: Dragon's Tooth
items.description: A dagger carved from a frost dragon's fang, eternally cold. It cuts through armor like paper and freezes wounds closed.

items.name: Crown of Madness
items.description: A crown of twisted metal and purple crystal that whispers promises of power. Wearing it grants terrible strength... at a terrible cost.

items.name: Warden's Blade
items.description: The personal sword of the dungeon's warden, stained with the blood of countless executions. It carries the weight of guilt.

items.name: Alchemist's Fire
items.description: A volatile concoction that bursts into flames on impact. Handle with extreme care - or throw at enemies with extreme prejudice.

items.name: Master Key
items.description: The warden's master key, capable of opening any lock in the dungeon. Its teeth are worn from centuries of use.

items.name: Scroll of Random Teleportation
items.description: A chaotic scroll that tears a hole in space. Where you end up is anyone's guess - it could save your life or doom you to somewhere worse.

items.name: Scroll of Town Portal
items.description: A blessed scroll that creates a shimmering portal back to Thornwick Village. The magic is one-way - you'll have to walk back into the dungeon.

items.name: Scroll of Phase Walk
items.description: This scroll allows you to step briefly into the ethereal plane, passing through walls to an adjacent room. Use wisely - some walls exist for good reason.

items.name: Scroll of Frozen Moment
items.description: Time itself obeys this scroll. For a single frozen moment, you can act while the world stands still - guaranteed escape from any battle.

items.name: Scroll of Skeletal Ally
items.description: Dark magic binds a skeleton warrior to fight alongside you for one battle. The undead serves without question - this time.

items.name: Scroll of Life Drain
items.description: Forbidden blood magic that tears the life force from your enemy and feeds it to you. Heals as it harms.

items.name: Scroll of Earthquake
items.description: The earth itself becomes your weapon. Devastating to all enemies, but use with caution in unstable areas...

items.name: Scroll of Polymorph
items.description: Transform your enemy into a harmless creature for easy defeat. Warning: effects may be temporary. Or permanent. Magic is unpredictable.

items.name: Scroll of Divine Wrath
items.description: Call down the fury of the heavens upon the unholy. Holy fire and righteous thunder smite your foes with extreme prejudice.

items.name: Scroll of Shadow Step
items.description: Become one with the shadows, striking from darkness. Guaranteed critical hit that ignores all armor.

items.name: Scroll of Chaos
items.description: Pure chaos magic - literally anything could happen. Heal, harm, teleport, summon, transform... roll the dice with reality itself.

items.name: Portal Stone
items.description: A smooth stone that pulses with spatial magic. Crush it to create a temporary portal to a room you've visited before. Single use.

items.name: Cheap Ale
items.description: A tankard of watered-down ale that tastes like it was brewed in a boot. Still, it takes the edge off after a hard day of dungeon crawling.

items.name: Thornwick Bitter
items.description: The local brew, dark as a dungeon and twice as bitter. Regulars swear by it. First-timers swear at it.

items.name: Dwarven Stout
items.description: Imported from the mountain kingdoms, this thick black beer could double as lamp oil. One mug and you'll forget your troubles. Two mugs and you'll forget your name.

items.name: Elven Wine
items.description: A rare vintage from the Silverwood, smooth as silk and sweet as summer rain. The elves say each bottle contains a thousand years of starlight.

items.name: Dragon's Breath Whiskey
items.description: WARNING: Extremely potent. This amber liquid was allegedly aged in a barrel burned by actual dragon fire. Drinking it may cause fire breath. Side effects include courage, poor decisions, and waking up in strange places.

items.name: Mystery Grog
items.description: Old Harken's special recipe. Nobody knows what's in it. Nobody wants to know. But adventurers who drink it before entering the dungeon are statistically more likely to return. Or so Harken claims.

items.name: Hero's Mead
items.description: A honey-gold mead brewed to an ancient recipe, traditionally served to warriors before battle. It tastes of victory and regret. The last toast of many a fallen adventurer.

items.name: Hot Meal
items.description: A steaming plate of roast meat, root vegetables, and fresh bread. Simple tavern fare, but it warms the soul after the cold darkness of the dungeon.
